body: This upgrade adds fancy furnishings to one room, such as wooden paneling, marble floors, fine ceramic teacups, lifelike paintings, and canopies for beds. The decoration is appropriate to the nature of the room and building. For example, if applied to a Bar frequented by soldiers, it includes patriotic heraldry and placards memorializing war heroes.
name: Furnishings
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Downtime/Rooms And Teams/Rooms and Teams/Room Augmentations/Furnishings
earnings: +5 on the room's check to generate capital
